bookSeries: The Secret Life of Amy Bensen #3
plot: Librarian's note: An alternate cover edition can be found hereChad's Point of viewEverything Chad thought was right turns out wrong. Now he's living with the consequences of his decisions, and no one, not even the dark-haired beauty who swears she can deliver him to the doorstep of his worst enemy, is granted his trust. He lives, eats and breathes two thoughts and two alone: Protect his sister Amy, and, revenge is everything.
